title: Need some help
body: Hello , some one know a way to get free riot points in a legal way I need 30 to buy the March bundle my problem is that I buy a card of 25 and 10 dollar for league of legends but I was thinking that the money will stack some how so my plant was to exchange for the pack of 35 dollar for 5000 riot points but I did not work that way so I need 30 more points to buy the March bundle

replies.body:
you can make some league fanart (no actual artistic talent required) in a picture editing program like paint, photoshop, etc that has something to do with league, like your favorite champ or something, and submit it in a ticket asking for a small RP gift(once per lifetime) 
considering it's 30 rp they should be able to easily grant it.

Since you're so close to getting that March Bundle (jealous), reach out to us in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and we can see what we can do!
{{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}
